DOC.brief_title: Topical Dexamethasone Tacrolimus Treatment Oral Chronic Graft-Versus-Host Disease
DOC.detailed_description: - Because one know study option best , participant `` randomize '' one two study group : topical dexamethasone topical tacrolimus . - Participants take medication mouth rinse four time day 5 minute time . After rinse spit medication able eat drink 15 minute . - Participants also take anti-fungal medication ( fluconazole ) orally week . - After two week study treatment , participant blood drawn monitor tacrolimus level . - After final treatment ( 4 week ) , participant follow test procedure : clinical examination ; questionnaire ; blood test ; oral culture ; optional tissue biopsy .
